sentences.sContent: If there were no subjunctive mood, English would be much easier.
sentences.sContent_eng: If there were no subjunctive mood, English would be much easier.
sentences.sCn: 要是没有虚拟语气，英语就会容易多了。

sentences.sContent: In his lecture the teacher expanded on the uses of the English subjunctive mood.
sentences.sContent_eng: In his lecture the teacher expanded on the uses of the English subjunctive mood.
sentences.sCn: 老师在讲课中详细地讲述了英语虚拟语气的用法。

trans.tranOther: a verb form or a set of verb forms in grammar, used in some languages to express doubt, wishes etc. For example, in ‘if I were you’, the verb ‘to be’ is in the subjunctive.
